The Argentum is a ministry within the Church of the [[Silver Flame]], a branch of the [[Order of Templars|templar]]. Originally dedicated to the acquisition, study, and redistribution of [[magic item]]s and artifacts, it was repurposed during the [[Last War]] to serve as [[Thrane]]'s espionage agency. Where the [[Royal Eyes]] of [[Aundair]] specialize in information gathering, the Argentum excels at theft and extraction, and has access to the warehouse of dangerous artifacts it has gathered over centuries.

The Argentum is led by Director [[Nystrum Shadar]].
title: Argentum
